column2: 2015 at St. Patrick's Catholic Church in Fremont. Visitation will be from 5-8 PM with a
column3: Vigil Service with a Catholic Daughters Rosary at 7 Pm all at Moser Memorial Chapel in Fremont. Visitation will continue on Friday 1 hour prior to the service at the church.  Burial will be at Calvary Cemetery in Fremont.
